Reviews.Title: Amazin TV, so far ...
Reviews.Author: Ahmed BAMBIGAL
Reviews.Content: I'm actually a gamer, in the first place I had a bad experience with SAMSUNG Smart LED 3D TV 46" model 6600, the TV lasted less than 6 months then died, so I decided to go LG this time and purchased this TV. The TV is amazing for gaming, I noticed a lot of differences from my previous TV. For the time being this is all I can say about this TV and I don't have any issues and I hope it will continue like this, so I'll update my review if I got any issues in the future.Updated 12th October 2013:I experienced some delay when I play games, I can tell that especially with fighting games where you need instant response to perform certain actions, I switched to game mode and it worked fine but I got stuck with bad picture quality, so I reconfigured the picture and saved it as expert1, now everything is okay no delay + nice picture quality.
